resources.string: In this test you will see 6 white boxes and they will open in a random order. There will be a pattern in one of the boxes and you have to remember which box it is in.
Touch the box where you saw the pattern appear.
Results of Paired Associates Learning Task:
A box will appear. Several patterns will appear inside the box, one after the other. Look carefully and try to remember the patterns you see.
A short while ago you saw some patterns. Now there are two patterns. Touch the one you saw before.
Results of Pattern Recognition Memory Task:

You will see some coloured boxes on the screen. In one box will be a blue token. Touch the boxes to look for a blue token. You have to collect enough tokens to fill the black hole on the right of the screen. To collect the token, touch the black hole. A token will never appear in the same box more than once.
Results of Spatial Working Memory Task:
You will see different boxes containing a blue square or not. Find the square and put it in the column on the left.

For this test, you will see some squares on the screen and these will change colour one by one. Remember the order in which the squares changes colour. You will hear a tone to tell you the sequence has finished. Then, touch the squares in the same order that they changed colour.
You will see a sequence of purple squares appear, touch the boxes in the same order.

First part of test: an arrow will appear in a circle, pointing either to the left or to the right. When you see the arrow pointing to the left, press the left arrow button. When you see the arrow pointing to the right, press the right arrow button. Press the buttons as quickly as you can, whilst trying to avoid making mistakes.

Second part of test: an arrow will appear in a circle, pointing either to the left or to the right. When you see the arrow pointing to the left, press the left arrow button. When you see the arrow pointing to the right, press the right arrow button. BUT, if you hear a BEEP immediately after an arrow appears, DO NOT press either button. Press the buttons as quickly as you can, whilst trying to avoid making mistakes.
An arrow will appear in the screen, use the buttons below to answer the questions. They can ask you to indicate the position where the arrow is located or the direction of the arrow.
You must respond to the questions as they appear on the screen by touching the on-screen slider and moving it to the appropriate position on the scale.
Do you find hard to concentrate today?
Do you feel motivated in doing your tests today?
Are you in ON/OFF state, in this moment?
Do you feel any pain or cramps?
How did you sleep last night?

Now you will see a series of coupled pictures. Please, try to remember the couples because, then, you will be presented only with one picture of the couple and you will have to choose the other one, picking the right one among 4 options. You will repeat the same exercise three time, with the same couples, so you will get more familiar with them.
In this test you will have 3 sticks and 3 marbles of different colors. You will have to arrange this marbles according to the disposition displayed in the figure on the left side of the screen.

In this test, you can view 4 cards, I would like that you put each card that will be displayed under one of the guide card where you think it’s more appropriate to. Please consider that you can match the cards according to shape, color or number criteria. I will tell you if you are doing right with a green tick or if you’re doing wrong displaying a red cross. You will have a feedback after each move.
Tap on the green area as fast as you can during 10 seconds. You can start when you wish.
Use two fingers to tap alternatively on the right and left buttons as fast as you can during 10 seconds. You can start when you wish.
Remember the following pair of icons
Choose the icon that matches the pair previously shown with the left icon
Welcome to PD Manager.\nPlease choose one of the options below.
Please type the name of the user this tests are addressed to:
You have scheduled to perform a set of daily tests!
You have ended this set of daily tests!
Are you sure you want to end this test set?
When will the user perform the tests (before 12am)?
When will the user perform the tests (after 12am)?
Choose the days of week the user will perform the tests.
In this test you will have to pronunce out loud the \"AAAAH\" phonema during five seconds when you are indicated.
Wait for the countdown to end in order to start
Speak out loud \"AAAH\" until the countdown ends!
